content: CFS-T SBO transit frames Transit frames for fitting modules to seal existing cable/pipe penetrations in concrete walls and floors ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Removable top with bolts for installing around existing cable installations Available with single- and multiple-frame windows in various sizes within single-row or double-row frames Available in electrolytically galvanized steel (grade S235 JR) Applications Wall and floor penetrations in concrete, masonry and lightweight walls For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Number of frame rows: 1 Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2060489 - Cable Transit Frame for use with existing cables in masonry and drywall - Package Size 1 pc - 2060506 - Cable Transit Frame for use with existing cables in masonry and drywall - Package Size 1 pc
